snippet.title: Eador: Genesis trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.gog.com/gamecard/eador_genesis

Eador is a universe made of countless shards of land drifting in the Great Nothing. Each of the shards is a little world unto itself, with geography and citizens of its own. The power over the shards is bitterly contested by Masters, the immortal beings mortals believe to be gods.

Take the role of the mighty Master and shape the destiny of Eador. Build your castle, hire heroes, recruit armies, learn spells or search for rare treasures in the deepest corners of the world.
